title: Escorts Kubota eyes land in UP for Rs 4500 cr manufacturing facility after pivot from Rajasthan
description: Escorts Kubota has announced plans to build a Greenfield manufacturing facility in Uttar Pradesh, seeking land acquisition approval from the state government. With an investment of Rs 4,500 crore, the company aims to generate annual revenue of Rs 10,000 crore and create 14,000 jobs upon completion. The plan is subject to necessary clearances.
